name: From TV Animation One Piece: Treasure Wars 2: Buggy Land e Youkoso
overview: The story is loosely based upon the East Blue Saga. The Straw Hat Pirates challenge Buggy and his crew to a race in order to find the treasure. The gameplay is similar to One Piece: Treasure Wars. The player is able to choose a character from the Straw Hat crew, including Nico Robin, to play in a board game style and race to find the hidden treasure.
